title: Tetragon eBPF for Kubernetes: The Verdict Is Out
author: B Cameron Gain
description: One of Tetragon’s key attributes is how it simplifies security observability, and it enhances observability without compromising performance.
cntitle: Tetragon eBPF for Kubernetes：结果揭晓
cndescription: Tetragon 的一个关键特性是它如何简化安全可观察性，并且它在不影响性能的情况下增强了可观察性。
